text: Higeno ana a'mo Agrira amanage huno asmi'ne, Nagra antahi'noe Mesaia'a (tazahu ne') egahie, (Kraisi'e hu'zama agima ante'naza nera), 4:25 Hibru kefina Mesaia'a hu'neana tzahu nere, Griki kefina Kraisi'e hu'neana tazahu nere, English kefina Savior hu'neana tazahu nere hu'ne.  ana ne'ma esnuno'a, maka'zana tasmi ama hanigeta antahi'gahune.
